CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Copilot in SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: ,Copilot in SharePoint combines the power of Large Language Models (LLMs), your data in the Microsoft Graph, and best practices to create engaging web content.  Get assistance drafting your content when creating new pages. Adjust the tone, expand meeting bullets into structured text, or get help making your message more concise. All within our existing commitments to data security and privacy in the enterprise.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Copilot in SharePoint
OldVersion.description: ,Copilot in SharePoint combines the power of Large Language Models (LLMs), your data in the Microsoft Graph, and best practices to create engaging web content.  Get assistance drafting your content when creating new pages. Adjust the tone, expand meeting bullets into structured text, or get help making your message more concise. All within our existing commitments to data security and privacy in the enterprise.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Copilot in Planner
CurrentVersion.description: Through simple, natural-language prompts, Copilot in the Planner Teams app will help you generate new plans, set goals, track status, and react to changes as projects evolve.

OldVersion.title: Planner: Copilot in Planner
OldVersion.description: Through simple, natural-language prompts, Copilot in the Planner Teams app will help you generate new plans, set goals, track status, and react to changes as projects evolve.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Add links to content in featured set
CurrentVersion.description: Global administrators/knowledge administrators can now add links to content sets in Viva Learning. These links can direct users to content stored internally with services like SharePoint and Stream or found online through YouTube, Vimeo, and other sources. The capability to add links to content allows admins to add content found online to featured sets, in addition to formal learning courses from connected providers.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Add links to content in featured set
OldVersion.description: Global administrators/knowledge administrators can now add links to content sets in Viva Learning. These links can direct users to content stored internally with services like SharePoint and Stream or found online through YouTube, Vimeo, and other sources. The capability to add links to content allows admins to add content found online to featured sets, in addition to formal learning courses from connected providers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Windows enrollment attestation
CurrentVersion.description: ,Physical Windows devices will be attested at enrollment that enrollment credentials are stored in the hardware of the device. Administrators can view device attestations in the new Device attestation status report and manually force attestation from that report.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Windows enrollment attestation
OldVersion.description: ,Physical Windows devices will be attested at enrollment that enrollment credentials are stored in the hardware of the device. Administrators can view device attestations in the new Device attestation status report and manually force attestation from that report.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Drag to order list items
CurrentVersion.description: Easily organize your list in the Microsoft Lists app by dragging and dropping items into a custom sort order for you and your team.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Drag to order list items
OldVersion.description: Easily organize your list by dragging and dropping items into a custom sort order for you and your team.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
CurrentVersion.description: This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
OldVersion.description: This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
CurrentVersion.description: ,This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
OldVersion.description: ,This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Auto-discarding Sleeping Tabs
CurrentVersion.description: Tabs that have been sleeping for a long time will be discarded to save memory. When a user navigates back to a discarded tab, the tab will need to be reloaded. This can be managed through the AutoDiscardSleepingTabsEnabled policy. This policy will be enabled if the SleepingTabsEnabled policy is enabled.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Auto-discarding Sleeping Tabs
OldVersion.description: Tabs that have been sleeping for a long time will be discarded to save memory. When a user navigates back to a discarded tab, the tab will need to be reloaded. This can be managed through the AutoDiscardSleepingTabsEnabled policy. This policy will be enabled if the SleepingTabsEnabled policy is enabled.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Deploy DMG and unmanaged PKG apps enhancement for macOS
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to use "available" assignment type for DMG and unmanaged PKG app types for macOS. This enables end users to browse and install these apps in the Mac Company Portal.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Deploy DMG and unmanaged PKG apps enhancement for macOS
OldVersion.description: Admins will be able to use "available" assignment type for DMG and unmanaged PKG app types for macOS. This enables end users to browse and install these apps in the Mac Company Portal.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Private Line on Teams Phone Devices
CurrentVersion.description: Teams phone devices will support Private line, a new functionality for Teams Phone that allows you to enable a private second phone number for a select set of users so they can receive inbound calls directly, by passing delegates, admins, or assistants. Calls to the private line are distinguished by a unique notification and ringtone.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Private Line on Teams Phone Devices
OldVersion.description: Teams phone devices will support Private line, a new functionality for Teams Phone that allows you to enable a private second phone number for a select set of users so they can receive inbound calls directly, by passing delegates, admins, or assistants. Calls to the private line are distinguished by a unique notification and ringtone.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: People app on Teams Phone Devices
CurrentVersion.description: An updated People app on Teams phone devices will provide a simplified and faster experience to help users manage contacts easily.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: People app on Teams Phone Devices
OldVersion.description: An updated People app on Teams phone devices will provide a simplified and faster experience to help users manage contacts easily.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Explicit consent recording meeting policy support on Teams Phone Devices
CurrentVersion.description: When explicit consent recording meeting policy is applied, a notification will pop-up when the recording or transcription is initiated requesting consent of participants on Teams phone devices.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Explicit consent recording meeting policy support on Teams Phone Devices
OldVersion.description: When explicit consent recording meeting policy is applied, a notification will pop-up when the recording or transcription is initiated requesting consent of participants on Teams phone devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Device Action - Remove apps and configuration
CurrentVersion.description: Intune will have the ability to temporarily remove apps and config from a single device, and then initiate a restore. This is intended to help solve customers' challenges external to Intune and quickly restore end user productivity.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Device Action - Remove apps and configuration
OldVersion.description: Intune will have the ability to temporarily remove apps and config from a single device, and then initiate a restore. This is intended to help solve customers' challenges external to Intune and quickly restore end user productivity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Publish analyst reports to Viva Insights App
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Insights analysts will be able to publish reports they have created to specific recipients in the Viva Insights app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Text and UI resizing for Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can adjust the size of the text and all other UI elements on the front-of-room display by changing the display scaling settings, providing greater accessibility options. The UI is polished in all supported display resolution and scaling combinations (1080p resolution at 100-150% scaling, 4K resolution at 100-300% scaling). This capability is extended to support touch boards.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Text Resizing for Teams Rooms on Windows
OldVersion.description: IT admins can adjust the text size on the front-of-room display by adjusting the display scaling using Windows display scaling settings or XML settings, providing greater accessibility options. Changing the display scaling percentage also affects the size of other UI elements.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - New ChatGPT Enterprise connector to discover and bring prompts and responses into the scope of Purview features
CurrentVersion.description: ,Using the unified Purview portal, organizations will be able to establish a connection to their ChatGPT Enterprise workspaces to discover, collect, and store contents of interactions of users with ChatGPT Enterprise into the scope of Purview capabilities and policies.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Data control to enable recycling or reuse of Employee IDs
CurrentVersion.description: By implementing a control for processing Employee IDs, we enable our customers to efficiently recycle or reuse Employee IDs, particularly in scenarios involving rehiring.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Pulse series for continuous feedback supporting AI transformations and change management
CurrentVersion.description: ,New Pulse series templates are being introduced that are tailored to supporting continuous feedback scenarios for high value use cases such as change management.
